CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, pg. A13, reads: "'DON'T GO NEAR THE WATER' - This group of lovelies took part in 'Miss Bronze' and 'Miss Glamour' contest which was part of last Sunday's fashion show and cabaret party at Westray Plaza, sponsored by Annabelle, the designer - modiste.  Left to right: Shelia Woods, Evelyn Kimbrough, Emma Hester, Jacqueline Lewis, Alberta Thompson, beauty contest emcee, Doris Walter Raleigh; Georgia Coates, Victoria Robinson, Helen Clark and Doris Johnson.  Miss Lewis was 'Miss Glamour,' Miss Thompson was runner-up, and Miss Hester came in third.  Mary Stevens was 'Miss Bronze.' - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of nine women modeling bathing suits for "Miss Glamour" beauty contest including Shelia Woods, Evelyn Kimbrough, third-place Emma Hester, "Miss Glamour" Jacqueline "Jackie" Lewis [Jacqui Thompson]  runner-up Alberta Thompson, emcee John "Sr. Walter" Christian wearing sunglasses, Georgia Coates, Victoria Robinson, Helen Clark, Doris Johnson, in Westray Plaza
